idea-plugin.name: Lune
idea-plugin.description:
Automatically generate Documentation for JAVA Web API
Http Test Client


GitHub | Issues |


how to use :

  • Http test
    • select method's name and use keyboard shortcuts alt + M for a specify method(must be a Java method)
    • select other place and use keyboard shortcuts alt + M for a empty http request
  • Generate interface documentation for Java class
    • selected file-> right-click -> new -> Api Document
    • or use keyboard shortcuts alt + G
  • Generate interface documentation for a specify Java method
    • select method's name and use keyboard shortcuts alt + G
  • Custom Your MarkDown Template
    • File -> setting -> tools -> Document Generator Settings
